## Spec Reference
> **How to get a stable permalink:**
> 1. Click the specific line number(s) in the file on GitHub.
> 2. Press the **`y`** key on your keyboard (this updates the URL to include the specific commit hash).
> 3. Copy the URL from the address bar.

**Permalink:** [Paste your permalink here]

_Text Reference (Optional): e.g. Unprivileged v2.2 ยง2.5_
